titleStmt.title: A spiritual treasure containing our obligations to God, and the vertues necessary to a perfect Christian. Written in French by John Quarre, Englished by Sir Thomas Stanley, Kt.
Thrésor spirituel. English.
titleStmt.author: Quarré, Jean-Hugues, 1580-1656.
Stanley, Thomas, 1625-1678.
Stanley, Thomas, Sir, of Cumberlow Green, Herts.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.R. for Thomas Dring, at the George in Fleet-street, near Saint Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Thomas Stanley [son of the translator].
A reissue of the 1660 edition, with cancel title page, added dedication, and table of contents.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
